scripts.commit-build-directory: git add -A && git commit -m 'add build files'
scripts.create-build: npm run build && npm run add-build-directory && npm run commit-build-directory
scripts.delete-deploy-branch: npm run checkout-develop-branch && git branch -D deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run checkout-develop-branch && npm run create-deploy-branch && npm run create-build && npm run push-deploy && npm run delete-deploy-branch
